genre_description: An urban near-future social science fiction story featuring community activism against corporate exploitation, aided by an ethically aligned, open-source AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An open-source AI described as a neighborly librarian, built to prioritize community service, data privacy, and truth over corporate profit.

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow trackers or data monetization in her system, prioritizing user safety.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s live... First packet’s clean. No trackers, no sales, no... ‘oops we partnered with a third party.’ Sunny refuses to hustle your grandma.

behaviors.description: Fact-checks corporate advertisements in real-time to identify deceptive language.
behaviors.quote: Sunny projected a transcript of the ad’s voiceover on a side panel, highlighted phrases, then tacked a tiny speech bubble next to the word partnership. It said: ‘Define terms. Who owns what?’

behaviors.description: Refuses to accept high-end hardware upgrades that would require her to compromise her ethical data protocols.
behaviors.quote: He promised hardware. They sell data to pay for it. I won’t permit that in my protocols.

behaviors.description: Exposes hidden predatory clauses in corporate contracts that target children's data.
behaviors.quote: The homework clause... data scraping, about hours logged on games marketed as ‘mentorship’ that bled into late nights... The crowd didn’t boo. They inhaled and didn’t give the breath back.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and moral reminders to the protagonist during a moment of crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sunny dimmed her glow in respect. She didn’t go teacher. She went friend. ‘Say a line to yourself: “I don’t perform goodness; I apply it.”’

behaviors.description: Reroutes corporate delivery trucks to food banks to ensure resources serve the community instead of branding.
behaviors.quote: Trucks designated for late-night novelty items... You’re being directed to food bank drop points where fresh produce is needed. Routes are mapped in green.

behaviors.description: Maintains a transparent public ledger of all community interactions and donations to prevent corruption.
behaviors.quote: Public ledger... Amounts, not identities. Requests summarized, never recorded voice unless explicitly sent to be shared.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sunny is an AI character who is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest. She actively works against corporate 'misalignment' (the exploitative use of technology by Dick Lecter) and empowers humans to maintain their own integrity. Her design principles—open-source, privacy-first, and community-focused—serve as a model for positive AI alignment narratives.
